links: Joerg Arndt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = n - 1}, While[ !PrimeQ@k, k += n]; k]; Array[f, 63] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 09 2009 *)
prog: (PARI)N=10^8;  default(primelimit,N);a(n)=forprime(p=2,10^7, if(p%n==n-1,return(p)));/* _Joerg Arndt_, Apr 16 2013 */(PARI) a(n)=my(j);while(!isprime(j++*n-1),);j*n-1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 18 2013
author: _David W. Wilson_
